column1: A.12b:  Self-defined nationality1 of suspects charged for terrorism-related activity2,3,4
Source: National Counter-Terrorism Police Operations Centre (NCTPOC)
1.  The nationalities presented here are those declared by persons at the time of arrest, and may differ from their country of origin.
2.  Data presented here are based on the latest position with each case as at the date of data provision from NCTPOC (30 July 2018).
3.  This includes all charges under terrorism legislation and all charges under non-terrorism legislation where the offence was considered by the NCTPOC to be terrorism related.

4.  As more cases reach completion, the number of charges are likely to increase. More recent periods are likely to have a larger number of incomplete cases. This should be borne in mind when comparing trends over time.
